author: goodbye

text:
@balthier1259
i think it is coz many games out there are venturing into 3d and openworld-ness. RO is "2.5d" and not as open world as most 3d MMORPGS out there now.
but i do have to agree... why do we need to venture and keep with the trend? to be honest, i prefer RO over most (if not all) of the 3d mmorpgs out there now...
its action paced, skill based, partially equipment based, etc etc, while most 3d mmorpgs are slow paced, HEAVILY eq based, no skill needed... wheres the fun in that?
